WWWOFFLE Request Information

The URL that you requested $url sent a Referer header that showed it came from the WWWOFFLE info page. This page shows you the information that your browser was trying to send to the real web server.

Header

The header that would be sent to the server would contain the following items (after WWWOFFLE has modified it, but excluding any headers for conditional fetching that might be used). 

%html[head2]
